channel.title: ::item for admin
channel.description:
hey can someone give me a ::item or ::pickup command that will work for admins?Using erasedpkz base,and i keep failing when i try :P
erasedpkz is pi,so,i'm using pi :P
Thanks

You’d learn that in Geometry class or any typical math class.

item.title: ::item for admin
item.dc:creator: @imsuperman05 imsuperman05
item.description:
@imsuperman05 wrote:

[quote=“pasta186, post:23, topic:421274”]i think when i copy and paste it i miss out brackets or something.Here’s my ::item command code:

[code]
if (playerCommand.startsWith(“item”)&& c.playerRights >= 2) {
try {
String[] args = playerCommand.split(" ");
if (args.length == 3) {
int newItemID = Integer.parseInt(args[1]);
int newItemAmount = Integer.parseInt(args[2]);
if ((newItemID <= 20500) && (newItemID >= 0)) {
c.getItems().addItem(newItemID, newItemAmount);
} else {
c.sendMessage(“That item ID does not exist.”);
}
} else {
c.sendMessage(“Wrong usage: (Ex:(::pickup_ID_Amount)(::item 995 1))”);
}
} catch(Exception e) {

			}

[/code][/quote]
Missing a brace.

item.title: ::item for admin
item.dc:creator: @pasta186 pasta186
item.description:
@pasta186 wrote:

i think when i copy and paste it i miss out brackets or something.Here’s my ::item command code:

if (playerCommand.startsWith("item")&& c.playerRights >= 2) {
				try {
					String[] args = playerCommand.split(" ");
					if (args.length == 3) {
						int newItemID = Integer.parseInt(args[1]);
						int newItemAmount = Integer.parseInt(args[2]);
						if ((newItemID <= 20500) && (newItemID >= 0)) {
							c.getItems().addItem(newItemID, newItemAmount);		
						} else {
							c.sendMessage("That item ID does not exist.");
						}
					} else {
						c.sendMessage("Wrong usage: (Ex:(::pickup_ID_Amount)(::item 995 1))");
					}
				} catch(Exception e) {
					
				}

Read full topic

Im using erasedpkz.At the moment,its in my owner commands,and it works fine.As soon as i take it out,and put it in admin commands,i get errors for some reason??

&& c.playerRights == 2 || c.playerRights == 3) {
in your code.

item.title: ::item for admin
item.dc:creator: @Thanks Thanks
item.description:
@Thanks wrote:

Not sure what base it is so yea hope these work for it…lol

Here is a 317 Delta command…

if (command.startsWith("pickup") && playerRights > 2) { String[] args = command.split(" "); if(args.length == 3) { int newItemID = Integer.parseInt(args[1]); int newItemAmount = Integer.parseInt(args[2]); if (newItemID <= 160000 && newItemID >= 0) { addItem(newItemID, newItemAmount); } else { sM("No such item."); } } else { sM("Oops! Use as ::pickup 995 100"); } }

And here is a 562 one for admin panel…

if(cmd[0].equals("item")) { if(cmd.length == 2 || cmd.length == 3) { int item = Integer.valueOf(cmd[1]); int amount = 1; if(cmd.length == 3) { amount = Integer.valueOf(cmd[2]); } player.getInventory().addItem(item, amount); } else { player.getActionSender().sendMessage("Syntax is: ::item <item> [amount=1]."); } }

Read full topic
